channel.title: Spiderfoot on STATE of OSINT
channel.description: Recent content in Spiderfoot on STATE of OSINT

item.title: Steve Micallef
item.description: ðŸ”— Twitter | Spiderfoot What was your OSINT highlight of 2020? Seeing the community and field, in general, continue to grow and thrive despite a challenging year. Seeing OSINT and SpiderFoot in particular be misused to falsely claim election fraud was a negative highlight of the year, for me personally. What emerging (good or bad) trends did you notice over the past year? My focus is on tools due to SpiderFoot, so that’s all I can really talk about.
